name: Kinagashi

skills.name: Leaping Sword Art
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 10%.

effects.notes: 2-hit attack. 1.95 ATK per hit base (2.145 ATK booked with +10% damage). Total: 3.9 ATK base, 4.29 ATK booked.
30% chance TM reduction (10%) per hit base (40% booked with +10% debuff chance). 2 hits = 2 chances for TM control. Decent for TM manipulation but not guaranteed.

skills.book_value: Low-Medium: +10% damage + 10% TM chance (30%→40%). Decent but not critical.
skills.notes: 2-hit A1 with TM reduction (40% per hit booked = 10% TM reduction each). Not guaranteed but provides some TM control. 200+ ACC needed. Good for cycling and minor TM manipulation.

skills.name: United Front
skills.description: Teams up with a random ally to attack a single enemy. Also fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 15%.

effects.notes: Team-up attack: Kinagashi + random ally attack target. Damage based on Kinagashi and ally stats. Good for extra damage and cycling ally abilities.
+15% TM for all allies. Team-wide speed boost. EXCELLENT for team cycling and speed manipulation.

skills.book_value: HIGH: -2 cooldown (5→3). MUST BOOK for team-up + TM boost cycling.
skills.notes: TEAM-UP: Kinagashi + random ally attack target + ALL allies get +15% TM. MUST BOOK for 3-turn cooldown. EXCELLENT for team cycling (team-up triggers ally + TM boost for all). Good for Arena (6/10) and Faction Wars (8/10) with speed manipulation.

skills.name: Recall from Death
skills.description: Revives an ally with 50% HP and 50% Turn Meter. Also places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on the ally for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Revives ally with 50% HP and 50% TM. Standard revive mechanic.
60% Inc DEF buff on revived ally for 2 turns. Good survivability boost after revive.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: -2 cooldown (6→4). MUST BOOK for revive uptime.
skills.notes: REVIVE: Revives ally with 50% HP + 50% TM + 60% Inc DEF (2 turns). MUST BOOK for 4-turn cooldown. EXCELLENT for Faction Wars (8/10) and dungeons (6/10) with revive + Inc DEF survivability. Standard revive but functional.

forms.aura: Increases Ally SPD in Faction Crypts by 24%
forms.comments: Support specialist with revive, team-up, and TM manipulation. A3 'Recall from Death' revives with 50% HP/TM + Inc DEF (60%). A2 'United Front' team-up + ALL allies +15% TM. A1 2-hit TM reduction (40% per hit booked). EXCELLENT for Faction Wars (8/10) with +24% SPD aura. Must book A2/A3.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: Low priority. If used: 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC (TM reduction), 40000+ HP. Revive not useful in CB. Team-up unreliable (random ally). 4/10 CB rating.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: PRIORITY: 220+ SPD (revive cycling), 200+ ACC (TM reduction), 40000+ HP (survivability), 2000+ DEF. A3 revive + A2 team-up/TM boost good for waves. Speed or Immortal sets.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: MEDIUM: 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC, 40000+ HP, 2000+ DEF, 150+ RES. +24% SPD aura helpful. A2 TM boost + team-up for cycling. A3 revive for safety net. 6/10 Arena rating.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: PRIORITY: 220+ SPD (CRITICAL - +24% SPD aura = effective 272 SPD at 220 base), 200+ ACC (TM reduction), 40000+ HP, 2000+ DEF, 100+ RES. A3 revive + A2 team-up/TM boost + A1 TM reduction EXCELLENT for boss waves. MUST BOOK A2/A3 for Shadowkin FW progression.

clan_boss: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER (2-hit A1 for extra procs)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, DETERRENCE (tanky support)
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (reduces A2/A3 cooldowns)
dungeons: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, DETERRENCE
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - reduces A2 5→3 booked, A3 6→4 booked cooldowns), LASTING GIFTS (extends Inc DEF buff on revived ally)
arena: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, DETERRENCE
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (faster A2/A3 cycling), LASTING GIFTS (extends Inc DEF buff)
faction_wars: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, DETERRENCE (tanky support for survivability), UNSHAKEABLE (+50 RES for debuff resistance)

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - faster A2 team-up/TM boost + A3 revive cycling), LASTING GIFTS (extends Inc DEF buff on revived ally for boss waves)
masteries.general: WARMASTER for all content (2-hit A1 for extra procs). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2 5→3 booked, A3 6→4 booked cooldowns for team-up/TM boost + revive uptime). Lasting Gifts (extends Inc DEF buff on revived ally). Deterrence (tanky support survivability). Unshakeable (+50 RES for debuff resistance). MUST BOOK A2/A3 for 3-turn team-up/TM boost, 4-turn revive. Build: 220+ SPD (revive/TM cycling, 272 effective with +24% aura), 200+ ACC (TM reduction), 40000+ HP, 2000+ DEF. Speed or Immortal sets. Focus: Faction Wars (8/10) with +24% SPD aura + revive + team-up/TM boost. Good for dungeons (6/10) and Arena (6/10) with TM manipulation and revive support. User Priority: Shadowkin specialist for Faction Wars progression. Spirit affinity = neutral vs Force/Magic, weak to Void.

blessings: Brimstone (if used in HP Burn teams - unlikely)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Good AI. Will use A3 revive when ally dead, A2 for team-up/TM boost, A1 for TM reduction. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: No cheese mechanics. Standard revive + team-up support with TM manipulation.

mechanics_advisory: Support specialist with revive, team-up, and TM manipulation. A3 'Recall from Death' is REVIVE MECHANIC: Revives ally with 50% HP + 50% TM + 60% Inc DEF (2 turns). MUST BOOK for 4-turn cooldown. EXCELLENT for Faction Wars (8/10) and dungeons (6/10) with revive + Inc DEF survivability. Standard revive but functional. A2 'United Front' is TEAM-UP + TM BOOST: Kinagashi + random ally attack target + ALL allies get +15% TM. MUST BOOK for 3-turn cooldown. EXCELLENT for team cycling (team-up triggers ally abilities + TM boost for all). Good for Arena (6/10) and Faction Wars (8/10) with speed manipulation. A1 'Leaping Sword Art' has 2-hit TM reduction (40% per hit booked = 10% TM reduction each). Not guaranteed but provides some TM control. MUST BOOK A2/A3 for FW viability (3-turn team-up/TM boost, 4-turn revive). EXCELLENT for Faction Wars (8/10) with +24% SPD aura (effective 272 SPD at 220 base) + revive + team-up/TM boost. Good for dungeons (6/10) and Arena (6/10) with TM manipulation and revive support. Build: 220+ SPD (revive/TM cycling), 200+ ACC (TM reduction), 40000+ HP, 2000+ DEF. Speed or Immortal sets. Warmaster for 2-hit A1. Cycle of Magic (faster cycling). Lasting Gifts (extends Inc DEF). User Priority: Shadowkin specialist for Faction Wars progression. Spirit affinity = neutral vs most, weak to Void.
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: Support specialist for Faction Wars. A3 revive with 50% HP/TM + Inc DEF. A2 team-up + ALL allies +15% TM. A1 2-hit TM reduction (40% per hit). Must book A2/A3. User priority: Shadowkin FW with +24% SPD aura.

update_notes.last_patch: Completed from DRAFT with full effects, masteries, and meta analysis. Faction Wars + dungeons focus. Validated against Ayumilove/HellHades. RaidWiki unavailable (500 error), stats from Ayumilove OCR (100% confidence - 8/8 stats).

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats from Ayumilove OCR (HP 18165, ATK 1079, DEF 1013, SPD 105, C.RATE 15, C.DMG 50, RES 30, ACC 0). 100% OCR extraction (8/8 stats). RaidWiki unavailable (500 error). 100% confidence.
